SELECT N.NO AS NO ,N.NOTICE_CNO AS NOTICE_CNO ,C.NAME AS NOTICE_CNAME ,('[' || C.NAME || ']' || ' ' || N.TITLE) AS FULL_NAME ,N.WRITER_NO AS WRITER_NO ,A.NAME AS WRITER_NAME ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,STATUS ,HIT ,IMPORTANT_YN FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY C ON N.NOTICE_CNO = C.NO JOIN ADMIN A ON N.WRITER_NO = A.NO WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y'
AND ('[' || C.NAME || ']' || ' ' || N.TITLE) LIKE ('%${searchValue}%')
AND N.CONTENT LIKE ('%${searchValue}%')
AND A.NAME LIKE ('%${searchValue}%')
ORDER BY N.ENROLL_DATE DESC
ORDER BY N.HIT DESC, N.NO DESC
ORDER BY N.NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(N.NO) FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY C ON N.NOTICE_CNO = C.NO JOIN ADMIN A ON N.WRITER_NO = A.NO WHERE STATUS ='Y'
AND ('[' || C.NAME || ']' || ' ' || N.TITLE) LIKE ('%${searchValue}%')
AND N.CONTENT LIKE ('%${searchValue}%')
AND A.NAME LIKE ('%${searchValue}%')

SELECT N.NO AS NO ,N.NOTICE_CNO AS NOTICE_CNO ,C.NAME AS NOTICE_CNAME ,('[' || C.NAME || ']' || ' ' || N.TITLE) AS FULL_NAME ,N.WRITER_NO AS WRITER_NO ,A.NAME AS WRITER_NAME ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,STATUS ,HIT ,IMPORTANT_YN FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY C ON N.NOTICE_CNO = C.NO JOIN ADMIN A ON N.WRITER_NO = A.NO WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' AND N.NO = #{no}
